entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Flurries inland in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
